law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this section, if an individual required to file an income tax return...

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this section, if an individual required to file an income tax return is unable to do so, an authorized agent of the individual shall file the return.

section.section: If an individual required to file an income tax return is a minor, the individual's parent or guardian shall file the return.
If an individual required to file an income tax return is a disabled person as defined in § 13-101 of the Estates and Trusts Article, the individual's guardian shall file the return.
